xml.data:
Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Maggasaṃyutta » 1.14 Oghavagga
1.14.3 Upādānasutta
Maggasaṃyutta
Oghavagga
Upādānasutta
174.
339“Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, upādānāni. Katamāni cattāri? Kāmupādānaṃ, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, sīlabbatupādānaṃ, attavādupādānaṃ—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri upādānāni. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya…pe…  ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo”ti.
340Tatiyaṃ.
<< 1.14.2 Yogasuttaup1.14.4 Ganthasutta >>
